section.p: A policy activity represents the policy or program providing the coverage. The person for whom payment is being provided (i.e. the patient) is the covered party. The subscriber of the policy or program is represented as a participant that is the holder the coverage. The payer is represented as the performer of the policy activity.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CDA Act
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode = "ACT" (CONF-49)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode = "EVN" (CONF-50)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-51)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF-52, CONF-53)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ActCoverageType Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19832) (CONF-54, CONF-55)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer, such that it
contains CCD Payer Entity (CONF-56)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant, such that it
contains CCD Covered Party (CONF-58)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] participant, such that it
contains CCD Policy Subscriber (CONF-63)
SHALL satisfy: A policy activity contains exactly one performer [@typeCode='PRF'], representing the payer. (CONF-56)
SHALL satisfy: A policy activity contains exactly one participant [@typeCode='COV'], representing the covered party. (CONF-58)

MAY satisfy: The value for participant / participantRole / code in a policy activity's covered party MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19809 PolicyOrProgramCoverageRoleType DYNAMIC. (CONF-61)
MAY satisfy: A covered party in a policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant / time, to represent the time period over which the patient is covered. (CONF-62)
MAY satisfy: A policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant [@typeCode='HLD'], representing the subscriber. (CONF-63)
MAY satisfy: A subscriber in a policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant / time, to represent the time period for which the subscriber is enrolled. (CONF-65)
SHALL satisfy: The value for entryRelationship / @typeCode in a policy activity SHALL be 'REFR' 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC. (CONF-66)

SHALL satisfy: The target of a policy activity with entryRelationship / @typeCode='REFR' SHALL be an Authorization Activity or an Act, with Act [@classCode = 'ACT'] and Act [@moodCode = 'DEF'], representing a description of the coverage plan. (CONF-67)
